item.description:
Enjoy an afternoon of walking and picnicking at Great Brook Farm, 984 Lowell St., Carlisle, Mass.,  01741. This event is designed primarily for beginners and will be lead by the TC and his dog, Winston. Dogs are allowed on the trails and they don’t have to be on a leash.  Bring provisions for a post-walk lunch. Rain cancels

Trip Leaders: Ron and Winston Budd.

Meet: 1 p.m. at Great Brook Farm closest to Concord Road and a large barn. The TC’s car is a grey Toyota Solara. It will have some type of sign on the rear and will be parked in the lot nearest to the main road to facilitate meeting.  Detailed directions and other information about Great Brook Farm can be found at: http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/northeast/gbfm.htm

RSVP: : Respond by 9 a.m. on May 19 to Ron Budd at 978-250-8131. Ron does not have email at home and cannot provide transportation
item.how_to_find_us: The Trip's coordinators will be parked in a grey Toyota Solara with with a Mosaic sign on it

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Walk and Picnic at Great Brook Farm
